alert.note: Alert for Clay; Oktibbeha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 10:53AM CST until January 03 at 11:45AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CST FOR NORTHERN OKTIBBEHA AND CLAY COUNTIES... At 1052 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pheba, or 12 miles northwest of Starkville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Griffith around 1105 AM CST. Pala Alto and Muldrow around 1110 AM CST. West Point around 1115 AM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for north central Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 500 PM CST for central and northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
